title: Wanted to ask if SkinPreview is allowed

embed.description: For those who have are looking for good alternative to Mk LoL or just want to install custom skins via category without downloading them, Skin Preview is a great choice. You get to install Loading screens, HUDs and Customs skins + all riot skins that you want to install all for free without any cost.

body:
I'll be buying like 30-40€ of RP soon and I was browsing the shop for some nice skins, but I have to actually see them ingame to decide if they look nice or not.

So I googled lol skin preview and found this program that allows to use the skins and some modded skins (from the pics they seem really nice I have to say) 

The site says _"The program is not breaking any terms of service, so its all legal/legit to use and Riot won’t ban you_" but I want to be safe and ask first

replies.body: We don't support the use of third party programs, and while we aren't necessary penalizing players for using skin mods right now that can change in the future.  We can't provide support if anything goes wrong, and we don't know what malicious content might be hiding inside them.  I'd personally suggest not doing it, so be wary!
